name: Inferno Hammer
desc: When this card destroys your opponent's monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field, and flip it into face-down Defense Position.

ocg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! Capsule Monster Coliseum promotional cards

tcg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! Capsule Monster Coliseum promotional cards
